name: Dilmun
description: Capstone team project built at Re:Coded bootcamp. Dilmun allows people to sell, buy and even donate products with a click of a button.

name: OOP Movie Project
description: A project to practice object-oriented programming in JavaScript. Utilizing TMDB API to get movies' and actors' details.

name: Firebase Blog
description: A blog website built using firebase authentication and cloud store. By signing in using your Google account, you can start writing blogs, and you get to delete your posts.

name: Shopify Challenge
description: Built using React.js and styled with Tailwind CSS, this website allows you to search for your favorite movies, nominate the top 5, and let the website choose a winner movie for you.

name: Mad Libs
description: A game where you fill in the blanks of an incomplete story and see your version updating as you type. This project was built to practice JavaScript.
